title: [Neuroscience] New study in rats suggests neuronal activity in the orbitofrontal cortex can encode alcohol preferences. The discovery may explain the neural mechanisms of alcohol dependence and lead to new ways of treating alcohol use disorder.

[Health] Playing with dogs can help treat Alzheimer's Disease. Animal-Assisted Therapy reduces depression and increases cognitive function in patients with mild to moderate AD by simulating memory, spatial awareness, and the use of language
